item.title: Coinbase
item.dc:creator: Artyom Gladkov
item.content:encoded:
UNLOCK $200 BONUS WITH COINBASE: 7 SIMPLE STEPS TO GET STARTED

Join our guide to kickstart your journey on Coinbase and potentially earn up to $200 as a welcome bonus. This course will walk you through everything from creating an account to making your first trade on the Coinbase platform!

Get started!

Register on Coinbase, complete KYC verification, and claim up to $200 in rewards. Exclusive to US residents.
 

LESSONS FOR YOU

Lesson 1
up to $200
Getting Started with Coinbase and earn up to $200 in crypto

Create and verify your Coinbase account to claim a welcome bonus up to $200. Understand the platform’s key features.

Go to lesson and earn rewards
Lesson 2
trading promo code
Buy and Sell Cryptocurrency on Coinbase & Get the First Trade Promo Code

Learn to trade crypto on Coinbase. Buy, sell, and convert assets easily. Earn a promo code for your first trade!

Go to lesson and earn rewards
Lesson 3
Learning rewards
Must-know crypto: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Altcoins

Discover the differences between Bitcoin and Ethereum and their unique roles in the crypto world.

Go to lesson and earn rewards
Lesson 4
Referral bonus
Maximize Your ProfitsÂ On Coinbase

Master market timing and strategies to maximize your trading profits on Coinbase.

Go to lesson and earn rewards
Lesson 5
Ask expert
Basic Concepts of Crypto Trading and Analysis on Coinbase

Explore trading fundamentals, read candlestick charts, and identify patterns to make informed trades.

Go to lesson and earn rewards
Lesson 6
Free market alerts
Trading Cryptocurrencies on Coinbase Exchange

Master the use of limit and market orders on Coinbase to enhance your trading experience.

Go to lesson and earn rewards
Lesson 7
Up to $200
Earning Passive Income on Coinbase

Earn passive income by staking your crypto on Coinbase. Learn the process, risks, and rewards.

Go to lesson and earn rewards

The post Coinbase appeared first on BeInCrypto.
